
                            
                            <p>我去买龙虾 去了永辉超市 <br> 永辉中虾线下23.9一斤 <br> 好多人在围着买 <br> 然后我在旁边搜了下京东到家 <br> 结果有优惠40-15 <br> 还可以用省钱卡3元  <br> 还可以数字支付-3元 <br> 最后算下来40元3斤 <br> 太便宜了。。赶紧买了两单 <br> 线下买3斤就是70元 <br> 我6斤才花80元。。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/105914dt7b93keo7cvv9co.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/105914dt7b93keo7cvv9co.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/105919n1nnnqrbhd9haiii.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/105919n1nnnqrbhd9haiii.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/110059lnd78cdqxz2x5jsn.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/110059lnd78cdqxz2x5jsn.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">线下可以挑，线上看运气</p><p class="pl">花了懂起哥一天半的工资</p><p class="pl">不吃小龙虾，但是支持分享</p><p></p>
                            <p>
